verbs.description: Since 1996 , the White House [V: has] hosted an iftar as an opportunity to celebrate Ramadan with the American Muslim community . But not the Trump administration .

[ARGM-TMP: Since 1996] , [ARG0: the White House] has [V: hosted] [ARG1: an iftar] [ARGM-PRD: as an opportunity to celebrate Ramadan with the American Muslim community . But not the Trump administration] .
Since 1996 , the White House has hosted an iftar as an opportunity to [V: celebrate] [ARG1: Ramadan] [ARG2: with the American Muslim community] . But not the Trump administration .
